sys_embedded_help_content.content:
The 'My NeedIt Requests' List

Use the NeedIt List to manage and keep an overview over your requested services and goods.

Note: 'My NeedIt Requests' displays your personal requests only.

Personalize 'My NeedIt Requests' List

You can configure the 'My NeedIt Requests' List to show the information you want to display.

  1. Click the Personalize List icon.
  2. In the Personalize List Columns adjust the columns you'd like to see.
  3. Select fields in the Selected bucket and remove them from the list view with '<' button.
  4. Select fields you'd like to see from the Available bucket and them visible with moving them via the '>' button.
  5. Change the column headers order with the '^' and 'v' buttons.
  6. With 'Ok' you're saving your personalized List view.

An helpful video guide

The following video provides a step by step guide on how to personalize your List view and how to set it back to default.

Personalize NeedIt List
sys_embedded_help_content.name: NeedIt List - User
